meanings.sent1: I tried some dulse in my salad for the first time.
meanings.sent2: The chef used dulse to add a unique flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The dulse in the soup looked like tiny underwater trees.
meanings.sent4: The dulse swayed gently in the ocean currents, like a graceful dancer.
meanings.sent5: The dulse tasted salty and fresh, reminding me of the sea.

meanings.sent1: Her dress was a beautiful shade of dulse.
meanings.sent2: The sunset painted the sky in hues of dulse and gold.
meanings.sent3: The artist mixed red and blue paint to create a lovely dulse color.
meanings.sent4: The dulse of the flowers in the garden stood out against the green leaves.
meanings.sent5: The dulse of the berries made them look ripe and delicious.
